data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Sardegna, Italy.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sardegna, Italy
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Sardegna, Italy.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Sardegna, Italy.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Sardegna, Italy to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the South Asian, Bengali-speaking people. 0.2% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, of the 1,335,863 people in the state of Sardegna who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 1,648,039 lost in Sardegna that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.section_summary:
the state of Sardegna, Italy has a population of 1,672,400.

We estimate Sardegna has 24,361 people who might know Jesus, 1,335,863 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 312,176 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Sardegna, Italy need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.
